message.title: Gift Recieved
message.body: {0} has sent you a gift. Visit {3} to get it!

feed.name: Level Up on Tropical Island
feed.description: {0}has reached level {1} on Tropical Island. Be the first to celebrate together with your friend? {2}

feed.name: Lost {0}
feed.description: My {0} is lost! Could any body help me find it back? By helping me finding my {0} back, you will also be rewarded a small bonus!

feed.name: Adopt {0}
feed.description: A {0} has turned up on {1}'s island. Be the first to adopt this lovely creature!

feed.name: Unlock {0}
feed.description: {1} has found the rare {0} growing on their island. Be the first to visit and you will learn how to grow it yourself!
